description:
How does it work?
Plug a USB stick in your TV and export the channel list.
Plug the stick in your PC.
Edit the list with ChanSort.
Plug the stick in your TV again and import the modified list.
Make a donation if you like the program.
summary: ChanSort is a PC/Windows application that allows you to reorder your TV's channel list.Most modern TVs can transfer channel lists via USB stick, which you can plug into your PC. ChanSort supports various models from Hisense (NEW), LG, Panasonic, Samsung, Toshiba and the Linux VDR project.
author: Horst Beham
